sense.gloss: famous piece of music, excellent song, (musical) masterpiece

sdata.j: リストの「↑忘↑↓わす↓れられたワルツ↑第↑↓だい↓3↑番↑↓ばん↓」は↑隠↑↓かく↓れた↑名曲↑↓|めいきょく|↓だと↑思↑↓おも↓う。
sdata.e: I think that Liszt's "Forgotten Waltz No.3" is a hidden masterpiece.

sdata.j: イントロを↑聴↑↓き↓いたときは↑名曲↑↓|めいきょく|↓の↑予感↑↓よかん↓がしたが、↑聴↑↓き↓き↑進↑↓すす↓めるほどに↑残念↑↓ざんねん↓な↑感↑↓かん↓じになった。
sdata.e: When I heard the intro, I had the feeling it was going to be a legendary song, but as I progressed further in, it felt more and more disappointing.
